actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the erection of an appropriate statue or other memorial in or near the Arlington National Cemetery to honor individuals who were combat glider pilots during World War II.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the head of the appropriate Federal agency (as designated by the President) to erect in the Arlington National Cemetery or along the approach to such cemetery, in Virginia, a statue or other memorial to honor the combat glider pilots of World War II. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the erection of an appropriate statue or other memorial in or near the Arlington National Cemetery to honor individuals who were combat glider pilots during World War II.
